name: City of Heroes
description: This installer is to install CoH using Sweet Tea, the main alternative CoH launcher, with fixed fonts and font smoothing. Mouse capture issues are fixed via WINE virtual desktop.
notes:
Select "Validate" to install a server's client. Select "Launch" to launch.
If you plan to play Homecoming, you will need to manually add the manifest.
After loading the game you might need to hit "Alt-Enter" to change to windowed mode as the resolution may not be supported.
content:
files:
- launcher: http://files.thunderspygaming.net/sweet-tea/Sweet-Tea.zip
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Sweet Tea
    file: launcher
    format: zip
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing Corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: tahoma
    description: Installing Tahoma
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: dotnet45
    description: Installing MS .NET 4.5
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    app: dinput8
    description: Installing DirectInput
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: FontSmoothing
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '2'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: FontSmoothingOrientation
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000001'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: FontSmoothingType
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000002'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: FontSmoothingGamma
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 00000578
- wine:
    Desktop: true
